title: Cubescape Experimental Animation
content:
Cameron Adams is one of those rare designer/developers that breaks right-brain, left-brain stereotypes. [Cubescape](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164014/http:/www.themaninblue.com/experiment/Cubescape/load.php?id=894) is one such example of an experiment in code that performs as beautifully as it is designed.

[![Cubescape](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164014im_/http:/farm3.static.flickr.com/2079/2496740032_d7faf499b9.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164014/http:/www.themaninblue.com/experiment/Cubescape/load.php?id=894 "Cubescape by Joe Pemberton")
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content:
Awesomeness to the max!! And, it can also be used to create architectural designs :)

The clear block is the best!
Yeah! The eraser is a bomb.
